data.prayer: There are 619,500 people living in the state of Ayacucho. Only about 89,251 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ayacucho, Peru
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 89,251 believers in Ayacucho to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 5.94 percent of the people of Ayacucho are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Ayacucho. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Nanti people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Ayacucho, Peru will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Ayacucho, Peru to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ayacucho, Peru has a population of 619,500.

We estimate Ayacucho has 89,251 people who might know Jesus, 493,455 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,795 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Ayacucho, Peru to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
